summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East Howell Street, from Twenty-fourth Avenue to Thirty-second Avenue; East John Street, from East Madison Street to Thirty-second Avenue North; East Thomas Street, from Twenty-seventh Avenue North to Thirty-second Avenue North; East Harrison Street, from Arthur Place to Thirty-second Avenue North; East Republican Street, from Twenty-ninth Avenue North to Thirty-second Avenue North, Twenty-sixth Avenue and Twenty-sixth Avenue North, from East Howell Street to East Thomas Street; Twenty-seventh Avenue, from East Howell Street to East Denny Way; Twenty-eighth Avenue and Twenty-eighth Avenue North, from East Howell Street to East Harrison Street; Twenty-ninth Avenue and Twenty-ninth Avenue North, from East Howell Street to East Madison Street; Thirtieth Avenue and Thirtieth Avenue North, from East Howell Street to East Mercer Street; Thirty-first Avenue and Thirty-first Avenue North, from East Howell Street to East Mercer Street; Arthur Place, from Twenty-seventh Avenue North to Twenty-ninth Avenue North; and Dewey Place, from East Thomas Street to East Mercer Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, 315 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle in accordance with Resolution No.
